Package ac.soton.gdp.lifeguide

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DBConnector
    An object that provides basic data retrieval and storage capabilities for TrialDefinition and Strategy.
    LifeGuideAPI
    A wrapper interface for the concrete LifeGuide API used to retrieve a Participant object from an id.
    Statistics  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Attribute
    An object which acts as a basic data store for the various attribute within a TrialDefinition.
    BlockedRandomisation
    Implementation for the blocked randomisation algorithm.
    DBManager  
    DBManagerTest  
    Group
    An object which defines a range of values.
    MassParticipantTest  
    MemoryDBConnector
    A class for simulating a DBConnector in memory.
    Minimisation
    Implementation for the taves minimisation algorithm.
    ParserTest  
    ParserUtils
    A class which provides access to a set of static functions which are required for parsing trial specification files.
    Participant
    A storage object representing a given participant, with their ID and a map of their responses for a specific trial.
    ParticipantCSVLoadTest  
    ParticipantGenerator
    A used to generate Participant objects, which random responses for each of the attributes in a given TrialDefinition.
    RandomizationTest  
    SimpleRandomisation
    Implementation for the simple randomisation algorithm.
    Strategy
    This class is the superclass for any allocation strategy algorithm to be implemented.
    StrategyStatistics  
    TavesStaticWTest  
    Treatment
    An object which represents a treatment arm within a TrialDefinition.
    TrialDefinition
    An object for specifying the setup of a given randomised control trial, including the Attributes, the treatment arms, the allocation method, and any additional parameters.
    TrialLoader
    A class which provides methods to create TrialDefinition objects from specification text files.
    UserDataLoader
    A class providing access to a function which converts user data in XML format to a Participant object.
    UserDataLoaderTest
